itemDescription: English singer, songwriter, musician and producer

wikipedia_page.main: Ben Jones (born 14 November 1982) is an English singer, songwriter, musician and producer living in Austin, Tx, and was a founder member of The Lovedays. and The Rifle Volunteers. He has released two completely solo albums, as well as albums with Carters England, The Lovedays and The Rifle Volunteers. His most recent releases are as part of the duo, Beat Root Revival, with Andrea Magee
